titles.title: Your grace is enough (more that I need)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your grace is enough
More than I need
And Your word I will believe
I wait for You
Draw near again
And Your spirit make me new
And I will fall at Your feet
I will fall at Your feet
And i will worship You here

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your presence in me
Jesus light the way
By the power of Your word
I am restored
I am redeemed
By Your spirit I am free
And I will fall at Your feet
I will fall at Your feet
And I will worship You here

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Freely You gave it all for us
Surrendered Your life upon that cross
Great is Your love
Poured out for all
This is our God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lifted on high from death to life
Forever our God is glorified
Sovereign King
Rescued the world
This is our God

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And I will fall at Your feet
I will fall at Your feet
And I will worship You here

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And I will fall at Your feet
I will fall at Your feet
And I will worship You here

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Freely You gave it all for us
Surrendered Your life upon that cross
Great is Your love
Poured out for all
This is our God

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Lifted on high from death to life
Forever out God is glorified
Sovereign King
Rescued the world
This is our God
